post.author: Steve Kang
post.content: password is "1". You will see the password the end of Opinion line... 황성규 wrote: > 강동경씨, > > 위글에는 비밀번호가 지정되있지 않네요. > 따라서 다른사람들은 위글을 수정할수 없습니다. > 비밀번호를 지정하시려면 수정버튼을 누르고 비밀번호를 지정하신후 다시 정장 하시면 됩니다. > > > Steve Kang wrote: > > Please give me a comment of seminar policy if you have. > > > > 1. Subscription requirements > > o Recommender who is a member of seminar group > > o Fee : $60 > > > > 2. Withdrawal(Taltae) conditions > > o His own will > > o Didn't pay the fee > > o Below 50% of attendant rate of last session > > > > 3. Compensation > > o Presentation of topic : $30(Credit) > > o Supporting a place : $30(Credit) > > * one time(presentation, supporting of a place) per session > > > > * The time limit of payment will be on April 27, 2001. > > * This draft will be decided as a rule if no objection by April 20, 2001. > > The valued member also will be updated according to the seminar policy. > > > > Opinion(name, opinion)(password:1): > > (ex.) kang,dongkyung:too expensive... > >
post.title: RE: 이글에는 비밀번호가 지정되 있지 않아요.
